ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Ways to gain experience without fighting
ygData.msgSnippet: I am very new to this and the Warrior looked toughest :) I do like to fight, I was just curious as to what other options were available. The repetitive nature
ygData.messageBody:
I am very new to this and the Warrior looked toughest :)
 
I do like to fight, I was just curious as to what other options were available. The repetitive nature of "Melee, Kick, Melee, Kick" wears on one's soul.
 
I am a human Warrior.
 
Denis
 

Denis A. Baldwin (A+/MCP/I-Net+/Net+/CCA)
Network Administrator, CAE, Inc.
810-231-9373, ext. 229
dbaldwin@...

-----Original Message-----
From: Nygaard, Jeff [mailto:jeff.nygaard@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 27, 2001 1:33 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Ways to gain experience without fighting

Do quests for exp, but if you do too much questing and not enough fighting,
your skills will start to suck. Why did you pick a warrior if you do not
like to fight? What race is your warrior?


      -----Original Message-----
      From:      Denis A. Baldwin [SMTP:dbaldwin@...]
      Sent:      Wednesday, June 27, 2001 12:27 PM
      To:      everquest@yahoogroups.com
      Subject:      [EverQuest] Ways to gain experience without fighting

      Is there any other ways to gain experience in Queynos without
fighting? Any
      place where I can train? Anything else I can do? I am a warrior,
Level 7.

      Denis

      Denis A. Baldwin (A+/MCP/I-Net+/Net+/CCA)
      Network Administrator, CAE, Inc.
      810-231-9373, ext. 229
      dbaldwin@...
